5 #define ROS_TDIFF(t) (t.toSec() - timeInit.toSec())

7 namespace pfuclt
8 {
9 
10 int MAX_ROBOTS;
11 int NUM_ROBOTS; // total number of playing robots in the team including self
12 int NUM_SENSORS_PER_ROBOT; // SENSORS include odometry, each feature sensor like
13 // a ball detector, each landmark-set detector and so
14 // on. In this case for example the number of sensors
15 // are 3, 1-odometry, 1-orange ball, 1-landmarkset.
16 // Usually this must co-incide with the number of
17 // topics to which each robot is publishing its
18 // sensed information.
19 int NUM_TARGETS; // Number of targets being tracked. In omni dataset, only one
20 // target exists for now: the orange ball. This may be improved
21 // in future by adding the blue ball which can be seen the raw
22 // footage of the dataset experiment
23 int NUM_LANDMARKS = 10;
24 std::vector<bool> PLAYING_ROBOTS; // indicate which robot(s) is(are) playing
25 
26 // Empirically obtained coefficients in the covariance expression. See (add
27 // publications here)
28 
29 // coefficients for landmark observation covariance
30 float K1, K2;
31 
32 // coefficients for target observation covariance
33 float K3, K4, K5;
34 
35 float ROB_HT; // Fixed height of the robots above ground in meters
36 int MY_ID; // Use this flag to set the ID of the robot expected to run a certain
37 // decentralized algorithm. Robot with MY_ID will be trated as the
38 // self robot running the algorithm while the rest will be considered
39 // teammates. Note that in the dataset there are 4 robots with IDs
40 // 1,3,4 and 5. Robot with ID=2 is not present.
41 
42 // Initial 2D positons of the robot as obtained from the overhead ground truth
43 // system. The order is OMNI1 OMNI2 OMNI3 OMNI4 and OMNI5. Notice OMNI2 is
44 // initialized as 0,0 because the robot is absent from the dataset.
45 std::vector<double> POS_INIT;
46 
47 int N_PARTICLES;
48 int N_DIMENSIONS;
49 
50 bool USE_CUSTOM_VALUES = false; // If set to true via the parameter server, the
51 // custom values will be used
52 std::vector<double> CUSTOM_PARTICLE_INIT; // Used to set custom values when
53 // initiating the particle filter set (will still be a uniform distribution)
54 
55 std::vector<float> CUSTOM_RANDOM_ALPHA; // Used to set custom values for the
56 // sampling models in the particle
57 // filter
58 
59 // for ease of access
60 std::vector<pfuclt_aux::Landmark> landmarks;
61 ros::Time timeInit;
62 
63 // Method definitions
64 
65 RobotFactory::RobotFactory(ros::NodeHandle& nh)
66  : nh_(nh),
67  pf(pfuclt_ptcls::ParticleFilter(
68  N_PARTICLES, NUM_TARGETS, STATES_PER_ROBOT, MAX_ROBOTS, NUM_LANDMARKS,
69  PLAYING_ROBOTS, landmarks, CUSTOM_RANDOM_ALPHA))
70 {
71  for (uint rn = 0; rn < MAX_ROBOTS; rn++)
72  {
73  if (PLAYING_ROBOTS[rn])
74  {
75  Eigen::Isometry2d initialRobotPose(
76  Eigen::Rotation2Dd(-M_PI).toRotationMatrix());
77  initialRobotPose.translation() =
78  Eigen::Vector2d(POS_INIT[2 * rn + 0], POS_INIT[2 * rn + 1]);
79 
80  timeInit = ros::Time::now();
81  ROS_INFO("Init time set to %f", timeInit.toSec());
82 
83  if (rn + 1 == MY_ID)
84  {
85  robots_.push_back(
86  SelfRobot_ptr(new SelfRobot(nh_, this, initialRobotPose, pf, rn)));
87  }
88  else
89  {
90  robots_.push_back(
91  Robot_ptr(new Robot(nh_, this, initialRobotPose, pf, rn)));
92  }
93  }
94  }
95 }
96 
97 void RobotFactory::tryInitializeParticles()
98 {
99  if (!areAllRobotsActive())
100  return;
101 
102  if (USE_CUSTOM_VALUES)
103  pf.init(CUSTOM_PARTICLE_INIT);
104  else
105  pf.init();
106 }
107 
108 void RobotFactory::initializeFixedLandmarks()
109 {
110  std::string filename;
111  using namespace pfuclt_aux;
112 
113  // get the filename from parameter server
114  if (!readParam<std::string>(nh_, "/LANDMARKS_CONFIG", filename))
115  return;
116 
117  // parse the file and copy to vector of Landmarks
118  landmarks = getLandmarks(filename.c_str());
119  ROS_ERROR_COND(landmarks.empty(), "Couldn't open file \"%s\"",
120  filename.c_str());
121 
122  ROS_ERROR_COND(landmarks.size() != NUM_LANDMARKS,
123  "Read a number of landmarks different from the specified in "
124  "NUM_LANDMARKS");
125 
126  // iterate over the vector and print information
127  for (std::vector<Landmark>::iterator it = landmarks.begin();
128  it != landmarks.end(); ++it)
129  {
130  ROS_INFO("A fixed landmark with ID %d at position {x=%.2f, y=%.2f} \twas "
131  "created",
132  it->serial, it->x, it->y);
133  }
134 }
135 
136 bool RobotFactory::areAllRobotsActive()
137 {
138  for (std::vector<Robot_ptr>::iterator it = robots_.begin();
139  it != robots_.end(); ++it)
140  {
141  if (false == (*it)->hasStarted())
142  return false;
143  }
144  return true;
145 }
146 
147 void Robot::startNow()
148 {
149  timeStarted_ = ros::Time::now();
150  started_ = true;
151  ROS_INFO("OMNI%d has started %.2fs after the initial time", robotNumber_ + 1,
152  ROS_TDIFF(timeStarted_));
153 }
154 
155 Robot::Robot(ros::NodeHandle& nh, RobotFactory* parent,
156  Eigen::Isometry2d initPose, ParticleFilter& pf, uint robotNumber,
157  RobotType::RobotType_e robotType)
158  : nh_(nh), parent_(parent), initPose_(initPose),
159  pf_(pf), started_(false), robotNumber_(robotNumber)
160 {
161  std::string robotNamespace("/omni" +
162  boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(robotNumber + 1));
163 
164  // Subscribe to topics
165  sOdom_ = nh.subscribe<nav_msgs::Odometry>(
166  robotNamespace + "/odometry", 10,
167  boost::bind(&Robot::odometryCallback, this, _1));
168 
169  sBall_ = nh.subscribe<read_omni_dataset::BallData>(
170  robotNamespace + "/orangeball3Dposition", 10,
171  boost::bind(&Robot::targetCallback, this, _1));
172 
173  sLandmark_ = nh.subscribe<read_omni_dataset::LRMLandmarksData>(
174  robotNamespace + "/landmarkspositions", 10,
175  boost::bind(&Robot::landmarkDataCallback, this, _1));
176 
177  if (robotType == RobotType::Teammate)
178  ROS_INFO("Created teammate robot OMNI%d", robotNumber + 1);
179 }
180 
181 void Robot::odometryCallback(const nav_msgs::Odometry::ConstPtr& odometry)
182 {
183  if (!started_)
184  startNow();
185 
186  if (!pf_.isInitialized())
187  parent_->tryInitializeParticles();
188 
189  pfuclt_ptcls::Odometry odomStruct = {
190  odometry->pose.pose.position.x, odometry->pose.pose.position.y,
191  tf::getYaw(odometry->pose.pose.orientation)
192  };
193 
194  ROS_DEBUG("OMNI%d odometry at time %d", robotNumber_ + 1,
195  odometry->header.stamp.sec);
196 
197  // Call the particle filter predict step for this robot
198  pf_.predict(robotNumber_, odomStruct);
199 }
200 
201 void Robot::targetCallback(const read_omni_dataset::BallData::ConstPtr& target)
202 {
203  if (!started_)
204  startNow();
205 
206  if (target->found)
207  {
208  ROS_DEBUG("OMNI%d ball data at time %d", robotNumber_ + 1,
209  target->header.stamp.sec);
210 
211  Eigen::Vector2d ballObsVec = Eigen::Vector2d(target->x, target->y);
212  pfuclt_ptcls::TargetObservation obs;
213 
214  obs.found = true;
215  obs.x = target->x;
216  obs.y = target->y;
217  obs.z = target->z;
218  obs.d = ballObsVec.norm();
219  obs.phi = atan2(target->y, target->x);
220 
221  obs.covDD = (double)(1 / target->mismatchFactor) *
222  (K3 * obs.d + K4 * (obs.d * obs.d));
223 
224  obs.covPP = K5 * (1 / (obs.d + 1));
225 
226  obs.covXX = pow(cos(obs.phi), 2) * obs.covDD +
227  pow(sin(obs.phi), 2) *
228  (pow(obs.d, 2) * obs.covPP + obs.covDD * obs.covPP);
229  obs.covYY = pow(sin(obs.phi), 2) * obs.covDD +
230  pow(cos(obs.phi), 2) *
231  (pow(obs.d, 2) * obs.covPP + obs.covDD * obs.covPP);
232 
233  // Save this observation
234  pf_.saveTargetObservation(robotNumber_, obs);
235  }
236  else
237  {
238  ROS_DEBUG("OMNI%d didn't find the ball at time %d", robotNumber_ + 1,
239  target->header.stamp.sec);
240 
241  pf_.saveTargetObservation(robotNumber_, false);
242  }
243 
244  pf_.saveAllTargetMeasurementsDone(robotNumber_);
245 }
246 
247 void Robot::landmarkDataCallback(
248  const read_omni_dataset::LRMLandmarksData::ConstPtr& landmarkData)
249 {
250  ROS_DEBUG("OMNI%d landmark data at time %d", robotNumber_ + 1,
251  landmarkData->header.stamp.sec);
252 
253  bool heuristicsFound[NUM_LANDMARKS];
254  for (int i = 0; i < NUM_LANDMARKS; i++)
255  heuristicsFound[i] = landmarkData->found[i];
256 
257  float distances[NUM_LANDMARKS];
258 
259  // d = sqrt(x^2+y^2)
260  for (int i = 0; i < NUM_LANDMARKS; i++)
261  {
262  distances[i] =
263  pow((pow(landmarkData->x[i], 2) + pow(landmarkData->y[i], 2)), 0.5);
264  }
265 
266  // Define heuristics if using custom values
267  if (USE_CUSTOM_VALUES)
268  {
269  // Huristic 1. If I see only 8 and not 9.... then I cannot see 7
270  if (landmarkData->found[8] && !landmarkData->found[9])
271  heuristicsFound[7] = false;
272 
273  // Huristic 2. If I see only 9 and not 8.... then I cannot see 6
274  if (!landmarkData->found[8] && landmarkData->found[9])
275  heuristicsFound[6] = false;
276 
277  // Huristic 3. If I see both 8 and 9.... then there are 2 subcases
278  if (landmarkData->found[8] && landmarkData->found[9])
279  {
280  // Huristic 3.1. If I am closer to 9.... then I cannot see 6
281  if (distances[9] < distances[8])
282  heuristicsFound[6] = false;
283 
284  // Huristic 3.2 If I am closer to 8.... then I cannot see 7
285  if (distances[8] < distances[9])
286  heuristicsFound[7] = false;
287  }
288 
289  float heuristicsThresh[] = HEURISTICS_THRESH_DEFAULT;
290 
291  if (robotNumber_ == 4)
292  {
293  heuristicsThresh[4] = 3.0;
294  heuristicsThresh[5] = 3.0;
295  heuristicsThresh[8] = 3.0;
296  heuristicsThresh[9] = 3.0;
297  }
298 
299  if (robotNumber_ == 3)
300  {
301  heuristicsThresh[4] = 6.5;
302  heuristicsThresh[5] = 6.5;
303  heuristicsThresh[8] = 6.5;
304  heuristicsThresh[9] = 6.5;
305  }
306 
307  if (robotNumber_ == 1)
308  {
309  heuristicsThresh[4] = 6.5;
310  heuristicsThresh[5] = 6.5;
311  heuristicsThresh[8] = 6.5;
312  heuristicsThresh[9] = 6.5;
313  }
314 
315  if (robotNumber_ == 5)
316  {
317  heuristicsThresh[4] = 3.5;
318  heuristicsThresh[5] = 3.5;
319  heuristicsThresh[8] = 3.5;
320  heuristicsThresh[9] = 3.5;
321  }
322 
323  // Set landmark as not found if distance to it is above a certain threshold
324  for (int i = 0; i < NUM_LANDMARKS; i++)
325  {
326  if (distances[i] > heuristicsThresh[i])
327  heuristicsFound[i] = false;
328  }
329  }
330 
331  // End of heuristics, below uses the array but just for convenience
332 
333  for (int i = 0; i < NUM_LANDMARKS; i++)
334  {
335 
336  if (false == heuristicsFound[i])
337  pf_.saveLandmarkObservation(robotNumber_, i, false);
338 
339  else
340  {
341  // TODO in the no-ROS version the y frame is inverted. Not here? Check
342  // later
343 
344  pfuclt_ptcls::LandmarkObservation obs;
345  obs.found = true;
346  obs.x = landmarkData->x[i];
347  obs.y = landmarkData->y[i];
348  obs.d = sqrt(obs.x * obs.x + obs.y * obs.y);
349  obs.phi = atan2(obs.y, obs.x);
350  obs.covDD =
351  (K1 * fabs(1.0 - (landmarkData->AreaLandMarkActualinPixels[i] /
352  landmarkData->AreaLandMarkExpectedinPixels[i]))) *
353  (obs.d * obs.d);
354  obs.covPP = NUM_LANDMARKS * K2 * (1 / (obs.d + 1));
355  obs.covXX = pow(cos(obs.phi), 2) * obs.covDD +
356  pow(sin(obs.phi), 2) *
357  (pow(obs.d, 2) * obs.covPP + obs.covDD * obs.covPP);
358  obs.covYY = pow(sin(obs.phi), 2) * obs.covDD +
359  pow(cos(obs.phi), 2) *
360  (pow(obs.d, 2) * obs.covPP + obs.covDD * obs.covPP);
361 
362  pf_.saveLandmarkObservation(robotNumber_, i, obs);
363  }
364  }
365 
366  pf_.saveAllLandmarkMeasurementsDone(robotNumber_);
367 }
368 
369 SelfRobot::SelfRobot(ros::NodeHandle& nh, RobotFactory* caller,
370  Eigen::Isometry2d initPose, ParticleFilter& ptcls,
371  uint robotNumber)
372  : Robot(nh, caller, initPose, ptcls, robotNumber, RobotType::Self)
373 {
374  // Prepare particle message
375  msg_particles.particles.resize(N_PARTICLES);
376  for (uint part = 0; part < N_PARTICLES; ++part)
377  {
378  msg_particles.particles[part].particle.resize(ptcls.size());
379  }
380 
381  // The Graph Generator ans solver should also subscribe to the GT data and
382  // publish it... This is important for time synchronization
383  GT_sub_ = nh.subscribe<read_omni_dataset::LRMGTData>(
384  "gtData_4robotExp", 10,
385  boost::bind(&SelfRobot::gtDataCallback, this, _1));
386  // GT_sub_ = nh->subscribe("gtData_4robotExp", 1000, gtDataCallback);
387 
388  // Advertise some topics; don't change the names, preferably remap in a
389  // launch file
390  State_publisher =
391  nh.advertise<read_omni_dataset::RobotState>("/pfuclt_omni_poses", 1000);
392 
393  targetStatePublisher = nh.advertise<read_omni_dataset::BallData>(
394  "/pfuclt_orangeBallState", 1000);
395 
396  virtualGTPublisher = nh.advertise<read_omni_dataset::LRMGTData>(
397  "/gtData_synced_pfuclt_estimate", 1000);
398 
399  particlePublisher =
400  nh.advertise<pfuclt_omni_dataset::particles>("/pfuclt_particles", 10);
401 
402  ROS_INFO("Created main robot OMNI%d", robotNumber + 1);
403 }
404 
405 void SelfRobot::gtDataCallback(
406  const read_omni_dataset::LRMGTData::ConstPtr& gtMsgReceived)
407 {
408  receivedGTdata = *gtMsgReceived;
409 }
410 
411 void SelfRobot::publishState(float x, float y, float theta)
412 {
413  // using the first robot for the globaltime stamp of this message
414  // printf("we are here \n\n\n");
415 
416  // first publish the particles!!!!
417  particlePublisher.publish(msg_particles);
418 
419  msg_state.header.stamp =
420  ros::Time::now(); // time of the self-robot must be in the full state
421  receivedGTdata.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
422 
423  msg_state.robotPose[MY_ID - 1].pose.pose.position.x = x;
424  msg_state.robotPose[MY_ID - 1].pose.pose.position.y = y;
425  msg_state.robotPose[MY_ID - 1].pose.pose.position.z =
426  ROB_HT; // fixed height aboveground
427 
428  msg_state.robotPose[MY_ID - 1].pose.pose.orientation.x = 0;
429  msg_state.robotPose[MY_ID - 1].pose.pose.orientation.y = 0;
430  msg_state.robotPose[MY_ID - 1].pose.pose.orientation.z = sin(theta / 2);
431  msg_state.robotPose[MY_ID - 1].pose.pose.orientation.w = cos(theta / 2);
432 
433  State_publisher.publish(msg_state);
434  virtualGTPublisher.publish(receivedGTdata);
435 }
436 
437 // end of namespace
438 }
439 
440 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
441 {
442 
443  ros::init(argc, argv, "pfuclt_omni_dataset");
444  ros::NodeHandle nh;
445 
446  // Set debug if asked
447  if (argc > 2)
448  {
449  if (!strcmp(argv[2], "true"))
450  {
451  if (ros::console::set_logger_level(ROSCONSOLE_DEFAULT_NAME,
452  ros::console::levels::Debug))
453  {
454  ros::console::notifyLoggerLevelsChanged();
455  }
456  }
457 
458  ROS_DEBUG("DEBUG mode set");
459  }
460 
461  // read parameters from param server
462  using pfuclt_aux::readParam;
463  using namespace pfuclt;
464 
465  readParam<int>(nh, "/MAX_ROBOTS", MAX_ROBOTS);
466  readParam<float>(nh, "/ROB_HT", ROB_HT);
467  readParam<int>(nh, "/MY_ID", MY_ID);
468  readParam<int>(nh, "/N_PARTICLES", N_PARTICLES);
469  readParam<int>(nh, "/NUM_SENSORS_PER_ROBOT", NUM_SENSORS_PER_ROBOT);
470  readParam<int>(nh, "/NUM_TARGETS", NUM_TARGETS);
471  readParam<int>(nh, "/NUM_LANDMARKS", NUM_LANDMARKS);
472  readParam<float>(nh, "/LANDMARK_COV/K1", K1);
473  readParam<float>(nh, "/LANDMARK_COV/K2", K2);
474  readParam<float>(nh, "/LANDMARK_COV/K3", K3);
475  readParam<float>(nh, "/LANDMARK_COV/K4", K4);
476  readParam<float>(nh, "/LANDMARK_COV/K5", K5);
477  readParam<bool>(nh, "/PLAYING_ROBOTS", PLAYING_ROBOTS);
478  readParam<double>(nh, "/POS_INIT", POS_INIT);
479  readParam<float>(nh, "/CUSTOM_RANDOM_ALPHA", CUSTOM_RANDOM_ALPHA);
480  readParam<bool>(nh, "/USE_CUSTOM_VALUES", USE_CUSTOM_VALUES);
481 
482  uint total_size = (MAX_ROBOTS + NUM_TARGETS) * STATES_PER_ROBOT;
483 
484  if (USE_CUSTOM_VALUES)
485  {
486  readParam<double>(nh, "/CUSTOM_PARTICLE_INIT", CUSTOM_PARTICLE_INIT);
487  if (CUSTOM_PARTICLE_INIT.size() != (total_size * 2))
488  {
489  ROS_ERROR("/CUSTOM_PARTICLE_INIT given but not of correct size - should "
490  "have %d numbers and has %d",
491  total_size * 2, (int)CUSTOM_PARTICLE_INIT.size());
492  }
493  }
494 
495  if (N_PARTICLES < 0 || total_size < 0)
496  {
497  ROS_ERROR("Unacceptable configuration for particles class");
498  nh.shutdown();
499  return 0;
500  }
501 
502  pfuclt::RobotFactory Factory(nh);
503 
504  if (pfuclt::MY_ID == 2)
505  {
506  // ROS_WARN("OMNI2 not present in dataset. Please try with another Robot ID
507  // for self robot");
508  return 0;
509  }
510 
511  Factory.initializeFixedLandmarks();
512 
513  ros::spin();
514  return 0;
515 }
